name: Wandering Sellsword
flavor_text: "My loyalty is to the highest bidder. Today, that's you."
visual_description: A grim-faced human warrior in mismatched but functional armor, leaning on a large, notched greatsword. He looks weary and battle-hardened. The background is a dusty crossroads with a signpost pointing in multiple directions.

name: Grizzled Veteran
flavor_text: "I've seen more wars than you've seen winters, kid."
visual_description: An older, scarred warrior with a grey beard and a missing eye. He wears heavy leather armor and carries a sturdy shield and a short sword. He has a calm, confident posture.

name: Steppe Charger
flavor_text: "It was born in the wind and will die in the charge."
visual_description: A powerful, wild horse with a shaggy mane, galloping across a vast, grassy plain. Its eyes are wild and untamed.

name: Novice Mage

effects.action: Look at the top card of your Library.

flavor_text: "The first step is learning to see what others cannot."
visual_description: A young apprentice in simple robes, holding a hand over a crystal ball. A faint, glowing symbol is visible inside the crystal. The background is a cluttered library filled with scrolls and books.

name: Hired Guard

effects.action: Defender.

flavor_text: "You pay me to stand here. And so I shall."
visual_description: A stoic, heavily armored guard standing at attention before a large gate. He holds a massive spear and his face is obscured by a helmet.

name: Scavenging Hyena

effects.action: When another Unit is destroyed, this Unit gains +1/+0 until end of turn.

flavor_text: "Waste is a concept only the well-fed can afford."
visual_description: A lean, mangy hyena with cunning eyes, skulking around a recent battlefield littered with broken weapons and armor.

name: Lookout

effects.action: The next Unit you play this turn costs 1 less Aether.

flavor_text: "I see them! On the horizon!"
visual_description: A person in a treetop watchtower, pointing urgently towards the distance. They have a spyglass in one hand.

name: Battlefield Medic

effects.action: Heal your Nexus for 3.

flavor_text: "A moment's respite can turn the tide of a war."
visual_description: A tired but determined medic applying a bandage to a wounded soldier amidst the chaos of a battle. They carry a satchel filled with herbs and potions.

name: Lost Soul

effects.action: Lifesteal.

flavor_text: "Where am I? Who am I?"
visual_description: A translucent, ghostly figure, barely humanoid in shape. It wanders aimlessly through a misty, grey landscape.

name: Armored Warhorse

effects.action: Overwhelm.

flavor_text: "The ground trembles before its charge."
visual_description: A massive warhorse covered in intricate plate barding. Its eyes are fiery and it snorts steam in the cold air.

name: Treasure Hunter

effects.action: If you have more cards in your hand than your opponent, draw a card.

flavor_text: "The greatest treasures are not always gold."
visual_description: A nimble explorer with a coil of rope on their shoulder and a torch in hand, peering into the dark entrance of an ancient ruin.

name: Master of the Guard

effects.action: Defender. Other friendly Units with Defender have +1/+1.

flavor_text: "Hold the line! Let nothing pass!"
visual_description: A commanding officer in polished, ornate armor, directing a line of guards on a castle wall. He has a stern, authoritative expression.

name: Silent Assassin

effects.action: Stealth.

flavor_text: "The deadliest blow is the one never seen."
visual_description: A figure cloaked in black, perched silently on a rooftop at night. They hold a pair of wicked-looking daggers, and only their eyes are visible beneath their hood.

name: Siege Golem

effects.action: This Unit must attack each turn if able.

flavor_text: "It knows only one command: advance."
visual_description: A massive golem made of rough-hewn stone and bound with glowing magical runes. It lumbers forward, oblivious to the arrows bouncing off its hide.

name: Chronomancer

effects.action: The next Invocation you play this turn costs 2 less Aether.

flavor_text: "Time is a river, and I know its currents."
visual_description: A mage surrounded by floating, spectral clock faces and hourglasses. They hold a staff topped with a spinning gyroscope. The background is a blur of past and future events.

name: Philosopher King

effects.action: At the end of your turn, if you have not attacked with any Units, draw a card.

flavor_text: "The greatest victory is the one won without a single battle."
visual_description: A serene, thoughtful ruler sitting on a simple throne, reading from a scroll. He is dressed in fine robes but wears no crown. The room is a library, not a war room.

name: Mercenary Captain

effects.action: Create two 1/1 Sellsword tokens.

flavor_text: "Double the swords, double the pay. A simple contract."
visual_description: A charismatic, confident mercenary captain, pointing forward with their sword. Behind them, two eager sellswords draw their own weapons, ready for a fight.

name: Ancient Wyrm

effects.action: Flying.

flavor_text: "It has slept for a thousand years, and its dreams were of fire and ruin."
visual_description: A colossal, ancient dragon with scales like obsidian and eyes like molten gold. It is perched atop a mountain peak, surveying the lands below with an air of immense power and antiquity.

name: Arcane Scholar

effects.action: Whenever you play an Invocation, this Unit gains +1/+1 until end of turn.

flavor_text: "Knowledge is power, but applied knowledge is victory."
visual_description: A scholar in a library, with one hand on an open grimoire and the other crackling with magical energy. Floating symbols and diagrams surround them.

name: Mysterious Stranger

effects.action: When this Unit is targeted by an enemy Invocation, draw a card.

flavor_text: "The less you know about me, the better."
visual_description: A figure in a wide-brimmed hat and a long coat, their face obscured by shadow. They are seen leaning against a wall in a dimly lit tavern, observing everything.

name: Aetheric Blast

effects.action: Deal 3 damage to any target.

flavor_text: "A simple, direct application of force."
visual_description: A crackling ball of pure blue energy flies through the air towards its target.

name: Sudden Insight

effects.action: Draw two cards, then discard a card.

flavor_text: "In a flash, the path becomes clear."
visual_description: A stylized image of a brain with a glowing lightbulb icon inside it. Lines of insight and connection are shown forming between different points.

name: Disenchant

effects.action: Destroy target Relic or Location.

flavor_text: "All that is built can be unmade."
visual_description: A magical artifact is shown shattering into dust as a wave of white energy passes over it.

name: Healing Salve

effects.action: Heal your Nexus for 4.

flavor_text: "A moment of peace in the heat of battle."
visual_description: A glowing green potion in a simple vial. A single drop is shown falling onto a wound, which closes and heals instantly.

name: Strategic Withdrawal

effects.action: Return a friendly Unit to your hand.

flavor_text: "He who fights and runs away lives to fight another day."
visual_description: A warrior is shown leaping backward out of combat, fading into a ghostly, translucent state as they retreat.

name: Forced March

effects.action: Give a friendly Unit Haste until end of turn.

flavor_text: "There will be time for rest when we are victorious."
visual_description: A line of soldiers is shown marching at double time, their forms blurred with speed. The ground beneath their feet is dusty and kicked up.

name: Stonewall Defense

effects.action: Give a friendly Unit +2/+4 and Defender until end of turn.

flavor_text: "They will break upon this wall like waves upon the shore."
visual_description: A single warrior stands firm, their shield glowing with magical energy as a massive enemy charge crashes against it harmlessly.

name: Ponder

effects.action: Look at the top three cards of your Library, then put them back in any order.

flavor_text: "A moment of reflection can save an hour of regret."
visual_description: A stylized head in profile, with gears and cogs turning inside. The art style is clean and diagrammatic.

name: Reckless Charge

effects.action: Give a friendly Unit +3/+0 until end of turn. It must attack this turn if able.

flavor_text: "Glory awaits the bold!"
visual_description: A warrior is depicted as a red blur, charging forward with their weapon held high, heedless of the arrows flying past them.

name: Ambush

effects.action: A friendly Unit gains Stealth until your next turn.

flavor_text: "The best trap is the one they never knew was there."
visual_description: A patch of forest floor is shown. Faint, almost invisible outlines of hidden warriors can be seen among the leaves and shadows.

name: Universal Answer

effects.action: Destroy target Unit.

flavor_text: "Some problems have only one solution."
visual_description: A complex, glowing magical circle appears around a fearsome monster. As the circle constricts, the monster dissolves into pure light.

name: Cataclysm

effects.action: Destroy all Units on the field.

flavor_text: "Let us wipe the slate clean and begin anew."
visual_description: A massive meteor streaks down from a fiery sky, about to impact a battlefield where two armies are clashing. The scene is one of epic, unavoidable destruction.

name: Sudden Reversal

effects.action: Gain control of target enemy Unit until end of turn. It gains Haste.

flavor_text: "I believe you were fighting for the wrong side."
visual_description: A warrior is shown mid-swing against an opponent, but their eyes suddenly glow with a new color, and they turn their weapon against their former ally.

name: Reinforcements

effects.action: Create two 1/1 Soldier tokens with Defender.

flavor_text: "Hold the line! Help is on the way!"
visual_description: Two spectral soldiers appear out of thin air on a castle wall, taking up defensive positions next to a weary warrior.

name: Amulet of Vitality

effects.action: Equip to a friendly Unit.
Equipped unit has +0/+2.

flavor_text: "Health is the first wealth."
visual_description: A simple amulet made of green jade, carved in the shape of a leaf. It glows with a soft, healthy green light.

name: Sharpened Blade

effects.action: Equip to a friendly Unit.
Equipped unit has +1/+0.

flavor_text: "A fine edge for a fine warrior."
visual_description: A whetstone is shown being drawn along the edge of a sword, with sparks flying. The blade's edge gleams with a razor-sharp light.

name: Boots of Speed

effects.action: Equip to a friendly Unit.
Equipped unit has Haste.

flavor_text: "Outrun the wind, outrun your fate."
visual_description: A pair of sleek, leather boots with small, feathered wings at the ankles, similar to the boots of the Greek god Hermes. They leave a trail of shimmering light as they move.

name: Cloak of Shadows

effects.action: Equip to a friendly Unit.
Equipped unit has Stealth.

flavor_text: "To be unseen is to be untouchable."
visual_description: A deep black cloak that seems to absorb the light around it. The wearer is completely obscured, appearing as a hole in reality.

name: Crown of Command

effects.action: Equip to a friendly Unit.
Equipped unit has, "Other friendly Units have +1/+1."

flavor_text: "To wear the crown is to bear the weight of all."
visual_description: An ornate, golden crown set with a single, large, glowing gem in the center. It radiates an aura of authority and power.

name: Wandering Inn

effects.action: Tap this Location. Heal your Nexus for 1.

flavor_text: "A warm fire and a soft bed for the weary traveler."
visual_description: A cozy, welcoming tavern with a thatched roof and a smoking chimney. A sign with a picture of a frothing mug hangs by the door.

name: Forgotten Shrine

effects.action: Tap this Location, pay 2 Essence: Draw a card.

flavor_text: "The old gods still listen, if you know where to whisper."
visual_description: A small, crumbling stone shrine covered in moss and ivy, hidden deep within a forest. A single, flickering candle has been left on its altar.

name: Training Grounds

effects.action: When you play a Unit, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

flavor_text: "Sweat in training saves blood in battle."
visual_description: An open training yard with weapon racks, practice dummies, and sparring circles. Several warriors are shown honing their skills.

name: Great Library

effects.action: At the start of your turn, draw an additional card.

flavor_text: "Within these walls lies the knowledge of a thousand lifetimes."
visual_description: A vast, circular library with shelves stretching up to a domed ceiling. Light streams in from a central oculus, illuminating floating books and scrolls.

name: The Crossroads

effects.action: Look at the top card of your Library. You may put it on the bottom of your Library.

flavor_text: "Every journey begins with a choice."
visual_description: A dusty crossroads in the middle of nowhere. A weathered signpost points in four different directions, each labeled with a cryptic symbol.

name: Haunted Battlefield

effects.action: Whenever a Unit is destroyed, its controller loses 1 Nexus health.

flavor_text: "The dead do not rest easy here."
visual_description: A misty, desolate battlefield littered with broken banners and skeletal remains. Ghostly figures are seen clashing in the fog.

name: Alchemist's Laboratory

effects.action: Tap this Unit. Gain 1 Essence of your faction's type.

flavor_text: "A little of this, a pinch of that... ah, the sweet smell of potential!"
visual_description: A cluttered laboratory filled with bubbling beakers, alembics, and strange ingredients in jars. An alchemist is shown carefully mixing two glowing liquids.

name: Traveling Merchant

effects.action: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

flavor_text: "I have wares from every corner of the world. Care for a look?"
visual_description: A cheerful merchant with a large backpack overflowing with exotic goods. He is leading a pack mule laden with even more supplies.

name: Grave Robber

effects.action: You may move a card from an opponent's Void to your own.

flavor_text: "One man's tomb is another man's treasury."
visual_description: A shadowy figure with a shovel, seen prying open a stone sarcophagus in a dark crypt by torchlight.

name: Chamber of Reflection

effects.action: Tap this Location. Discard a card, then draw a card.

flavor_text: "Clarity is found in stillness."
visual_description: A quiet, circular room with a single, large mirror in the center. The mirror reflects not the room, but a starry cosmos.

name: The Unblinking Eye

effects.action: Equip to a friendly Unit.
You may look at your opponent's hand at any time.

flavor_text: "Nothing can be hidden."
visual_description: A golden amulet in the shape of an eye. The pupil is a large, unblinking gemstone that seems to follow the viewer.

name: King Paimon, Lord of Secrets

effects.action: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card. They discard that card.
Search your Library for any card and put it into your hand.

flavor_text: "He teaches all arts and sciences, but the first lesson is always obedience."
visual_description: A regal figure with an effeminate face, wearing a glorious crown, riding a dromedary camel. He is preceded by a host of demons playing trumpets. The art style is dark classical realism, with rich, royal colors against a dark background. [1]

name: King Belial, the Worthless One

effects.trigger: Pact - Sacrifice two other friendly Units
effects.action: Gain control of target enemy Unit. It gains Haste.
Your opponent discards two cards.

flavor_text: "He appears comely, but speaks only deceit. Do not mistake his gifts for kindness."
visual_description: A majestic, beautiful angel sitting on a chariot of fire, but his shadow is monstrous and twisted. He offers a golden crown with one hand while the other is hidden behind his back. The art style is dark classical realism, with a high contrast between the divine light of his form and the abyssal darkness of his shadow. The background is a ruined celestial court. [1]

name: Duke Astaroth, the Treasurer

effects.action: Draw two cards.
Lifesteal.

flavor_text: "He speaks of liberal sciences and the fall of spirits, but his true lesson is in the comfort of sloth."
visual_description: A nude, androgynous figure with feathered wings, wearing a crown, holding a serpent, riding a beast with dragon-like wings and a serpent-like tail. The style is reminiscent of a dark Renaissance painting, with a palette of deep reds and shadowy blacks. [1]

name: Duke Amdusias, the Cacophonous

effects.action: Give all enemy Units -1/-1 until your next turn.
Silence a target Unit.

flavor_text: "At his command, trumpets sound from unseen corners, and even the trees bend as if in agony."
visual_description: A shadowy figure with the head of a unicorn and long, clawed hands. He is surrounded by invisible, shimmering waves of sound that visibly distort the air around him. The background is a dark, twisted forest where the trees are bent into unnatural shapes. [1]

name: Marquis Andras, the Discordant

effects.action: Haste. At the end of your turn, Andras deals 3 damage to your Nexus.

flavor_text: "He teaches those he favors to kill their enemies. And their friends. And themselves."
visual_description: A winged angel's body with the head of a raven, riding a powerful black wolf and wielding a sharp, gleaming sword. The art is chaotic and violent, with a sense of imminent danger. [1]

name: President Malphas, the Architect

effects.action: Create two 0/3 "Infernal Tower" Location tokens with Defender.
Destroy target enemy Location.

flavor_text: "He builds strongholds for the ambitious and tears them down for the foolish."
visual_description: A crow that is mid-transformation into a man with a hoarse, knowing expression. In the background, impossible towers of black stone rise into a stormy sky. [1]

name: Count Ronové, the Harvester

effects.action: Return a friendly Unit with cost 2 or less from your Void to your hand.

flavor_text: "He grants the favor of friends and foes, but he is, first and foremost, a taker of old souls."
visual_description: A monstrous figure holding a weathered, ancient staff. He is depicted as a shadowy collector, with glowing eyes peering from beneath a deep hood. The souls of the decrepit and dying visibly swirl around his feet. The art style is gritty and textured. [1]

name: Marquis Forneus, Sea-Monster

effects.action: Armor 1.
Target enemy Unit cannot attack next turn.

flavor_text: "He gives men a good name, but drags their secrets up from the depths."
visual_description: A massive sea monster, parts of which are obscured by dark, churning water. Its visible form is a blend of whale, shark, and something more ancient and tentacled. Its eyes glow with cunning intelligence. The scene is lit by eerie bioluminescence from the abyss. [1]

name: Duke Agares, the Earthshaker

effects.action: Move a target enemy Unit from the Support row to the Frontline.
Destroy target enemy Location.

flavor_text: "He teaches the language of earthquakes and the dance of fleeing armies."
visual_description: A pale old man with a noble but cruel face, riding a massive crocodile. He holds a goshawk on his wrist. The ground around him is cracked and broken. [1]

name: Prince Vassago, the Seer

effects.action: Look at the top three cards of your Library. Put them back in any order. You may put one of them into your Void.

flavor_text: "He is of a good nature, and will tell you of things past, present, and future... for a price."
visual_description: An angelic figure whose form is indistinct and shimmering, as if seen through heat haze. They are pointing towards a swirling pool of water that shows visions of the future. [1]

name: Earl Bifrons, the Grave-Tender

effects.action: Move a Unit from any Void to the top of its owner's Library.

flavor_text: "He lights the candles on the tombs and teaches the virtues of herbs and stones."
visual_description: A monstrous figure that is changing into a man. He is seen in a misty graveyard, moving corpses from one grave to another while strange, magical lights flicker on the tombstones. [1]

name: President Buer, the Healer

effects.action: Heal your Nexus for 5.
Give a friendly Unit Lifesteal until end of turn.

flavor_text: "He teaches the virtues of all herbs, but his cures often carry a subtle poison."
visual_description: A lion's head with five goat legs radiating from it, allowing it to walk in any direction. It appears within a glowing green circle of herbal symbols. The art is strange and unsettling, like an alchemical diagram come to life. [1]

name: Infernal Familiar

effects.action: Gain 1 Infernal Essence.

flavor_text: "A small price for a small power. Be warned, however, for all debts to the Court eventually come due."
visual_description: A small, winged imp-like creature, perched on a pile of skulls. It has a mischievous, intelligent look in its eyes and is holding a single, tarnished gold coin. The style is dark and detailed, with a focus on the creature's impish but sinister nature.

name: Hellsworn Legionnaire
flavor_text: "Their loyalty is absolute, their price eternal."
visual_description: A demonic foot soldier in black, jagged armor. Its face is a snarling, bestial mask, and it wields a cruel-looking barbed spear.

name: Soul-Pact Imp

effects.action: Draw a card.

flavor_text: "A little pain for a little knowledge. A fair trade, no?"
visual_description: A wiry imp is shown pricking its finger with a needle and letting a drop of blood fall onto a contract, which glows with dark energy.

name: Bound Spirit

effects.action: Defender.

flavor_text: "Its chains are forged from its own regrets."
visual_description: A translucent spirit bound in glowing, ethereal chains. It has a sorrowful expression and cannot move from its spot.

name: Ambitious Courtier

effects.action: If you control a Goetia Demon with a higher rank (Duke, King, etc.), this Unit has +1/+1.

flavor_text: "In the courts of Hell, even mortals can rise... or fall."
visual_description: A human in dark, lavish courtly attire, whispering into the ear of a massive, enthroned demon. The human's face is a mask of ambition and sycophancy.

name: Vile Sacrificer

effects.action: Tap and Sacrifice this Unit. Gain 2 Infernal Essence.

flavor_text: "My life for the cause."
visual_description: A cloaked cultist willingly offering themselves on a dark altar. A shadowy, demonic hand is reaching down to accept the sacrifice.

name: Grave-Hound
flavor_text: "It feeds on the echoes of the dead."
visual_description: A skeletal, dog-like beast with glowing red eyes. It is shown digging up a fresh grave in a dark cemetery.

name: Pact-Sworn Guard

effects.action: Defender.

flavor_text: "My watch is eternal."
visual_description: A heavily armored demonic guard, larger than a human, standing before a massive, ornate gate. Its armor is covered in glowing sigils.

name: Lesser Key of Solomon

effects.action: Equip to a friendly Unit.
Tap this Unit. Look at the top card of your Library. You may play it by paying its Pact cost for free."

flavor_text: "To open the book is to open a door you can never again close."
visual_description: An ancient grimoire with a large, complex sigil on its cover. When opened, spectral demonic forms are shown swirling out of its pages.

name: Ring of Command

effects.action: Equip to a friendly Unit.
Equipped unit has +1/+1.
The equipped unit gains Flying until end of turn.

flavor_text: "A small circle to bind a great power."
visual_description: A silver ring with a single, glowing red gem. It is shown on a finger, and the gem is pulsing with dark energy.

name: Sacrificial Dagger

effects.action: Equip to a friendly Unit.
Sacrifice this Unit. Draw two cards."

flavor_text: "A sharp end for a new beginning."
visual_description: An ornate, obsidian dagger with a hilt carved into the shape of a coiled serpent. The blade has glowing red runes etched into it. It is shown resting on a velvet cloth next to a silver bowl.

name: Chains of Binding

effects.action: Equip to an enemy Unit.
Equipped unit has -2/-0.

flavor_text: "What cannot be destroyed must be contained."
visual_description: Heavy, black iron chains, glowing with faint purple runes, materialize around an enemy creature, constricting its movement.

name: Pact of Ruin

effects.action: Destroy a friendly Unit. Then, destroy a target enemy Unit with equal or lesser cost.

flavor_text: "A soul for a soul. The math is simple, and always in our favor."
visual_description: A glowing, blood-red sigil materializes in the air between two figures, one willing and one terrified. As the sigil flares, the life force visibly drains from both, depicted as streams of red light flowing into the sigil.

name: Hellfire

effects.action: Deal 4 damage to any target.

flavor_text: "The fire that cleanses nothing and consumes everything."
visual_description: A torrent of black and purple flame erupts from the ground, shaped like grasping, skeletal hands. The fire gives off no light, only a consuming darkness that seems to absorb the light around it.

name: Diabolic Tutor

effects.action: Search your Library for any card and put it into your hand. Lose 2 Nexus Health.

flavor_text: "All knowledge has its price."
visual_description: A demonic hand reaches out of a swirling vortex of shadow and offers a glowing, forbidden scroll to a mortal.

name: Whispers of Power

effects.action: Give a friendly Unit +2/+2 until end of turn. At the end of the turn, destroy it.

flavor_text: "A taste of true power is enough to shatter a lesser vessel."
visual_description: A demon is shown whispering into the ear of a warrior. The warrior's eyes glow with immense power, but cracks begin to form on their skin.

name: Demonic Consultation

effects.action: Name a card. Banish the top six cards of your Library, then put the first card you named that's among them into your hand.

flavor_text: "Be careful what you ask for. You will almost certainly get it."
visual_description: A sorcerer is shown kneeling before a swirling portal of darkness, their face a mask of desperation. From the portal, a single, perfect card is offered forth by a shadowy claw.

name: Soul Exchange

effects.action: As an additional cost to play this, sacrifice a Unit.
Return a Unit with a higher Aether cost from your Void to the battlefield.

flavor_text: "An upgrade, of sorts."
visual_description: A small imp is shown dissolving into motes of red light, which then coalesce into the form of a massive, powerful demon.

name: The Grand Grimoire

effects.action: Once per turn, you may pay 3 Nexus Health. If you do, look at the top three cards of your Library and put one into your hand. Put the rest into your Void.

flavor_text: "Every page turned is a bargain made."
visual_description: An ancient, leather-bound book chained to a pedestal in a dark library. The book is open, and glowing sigils float off the page. The air around it is thick with shadows and whispers. The card frame itself should look like the cover of this book.

name: The Summoning Circle

effects.action: The first Goetia Demon you play each turn costs 1 less Aether.

flavor_text: "The circle does not keep them out. It invites them in."
visual_description: A complex chalk circle drawn on a stone floor, filled with Enochian and demonic sigils. The lines of the circle glow with a faint, ominous light.

name: Altar of Despair

effects.action: Tap this Location, Sacrifice a Unit: Gain 3 Infernal Essence.

flavor_text: "Despair is the purest fuel for our ambitions."
visual_description: A black, obsidian altar stained with old blood. It is located in a dark, cavernous temple. A single, black candle burns on it, its flame casting long, dancing shadows.

name: The Crossroads

effects.action: Tap this Location, pay 1 Nexus Health: Gain 1 Infernal Essence.

flavor_text: "All deals are made at the crossroads, between one world and the next."
visual_description: A lonely, windswept crossroads at midnight under a full moon. A shadowy, indistinct figure can be seen waiting where the paths meet.

name: Throne of the Usurper

effects.action: Friendly Goetia Demon - King units have +2/+2.

flavor_text: "This throne was not given. It was taken."
visual_description: A massive, intimidating throne made of black iron and sharpened bones, draped in tattered crimson banners. It sits empty in a vast, dark hall.

name: Marquis Gamigin, the Necromancer

effects.action: Give a target enemy Unit -1/-1.

effects.trigger: Pact - Banish a Unit from your Void
effects.action: Give that enemy Unit an additional -2/-2.

flavor_text: "He speaks with the souls of those who died in sin, and they have such interesting stories to tell."
visual_description: A small, spectral horse that transforms into a man with a hoarse voice. He is surrounded by ghostly, translucent figures of the dead. [1]

name: Duke Barbatos, the Whisperer

effects.action: Reveal the top card of your opponent's Library. You may have them put it into their Void.

flavor_text: "He understands the language of birds and beasts, and the secret thoughts of men."
visual_description: A bearded old man who looks like a philosopher, accompanied by four noble kings. He is shown listening intently as a flock of birds whispers secrets into his ear. [1]

name: President Foras, the Wise

effects.action: You may search your Library for a Relic card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

flavor_text: "He teaches logic and ethics, and the value of a well-placed lie."
visual_description: A strong man in simple robes, but his eyes glow with ancient power. He holds a perfectly clear crystal in one hand, which reveals hidden treasures. [1]

name: King Vine, the Besieger

effects.action: Siege (This Unit deals double damage to Locations).
This Unit gains Flying until end of turn.

flavor_text: "No wall can stand against him, whether it is made of stone or of faith."
visual_description: A fierce lion holding a venomous snake in its mouth, riding a pitch-black horse. He is shown effortlessly knocking down the stone wall of a fortress. [1]

name: President Glasya-Labolas

effects.action: Target friendly Unit gains Deathtouch until end of turn.

flavor_text: "He is the captain of manslaughter and bloodshed, and business is always good."
visual_description: A winged dog, like a hellhound with griffin wings. It is shown leading a pack of shadowy beasts into battle. [1]

name: Duke Eligos, the Knight

effects.action: Choose a Location in your Songline. Trigger its "When a Unit Dreams to this Location" ability.

flavor_text: "Sing the land into being once more."
visual_description: An Aboriginal elder is shown chanting, their voice visualized as waves of colorful energy that flow out and visibly alter the landscape around them, causing rocks to rise and rivers to form.

name: Sing the Path

effects.action: Search your Library for a Location card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

flavor_text: "The journey is in the song."
visual_description: A series of glowing musical notes are shown forming a path across a map of Australia, connecting different sacred sites.

name: Ancestral Call

effects.action: Return a friendly Ancestor Spirit from your Void to your hand.

flavor_text: "The old ones are always listening."
visual_description: A ghostly, translucent hand reaches up from the earth to touch the hand of a living person, conveying a sense of connection and guidance.

effects.action: Look at the top three cards of your Library. You may play a Location from among them, paying its cost. Put the rest back in any order.

effects.action: Destroy all non-Ancestor Spirit Units.

effects.action: Give a friendly Unit +2/+2 until end of turn.

effects.action: Deal 2 damage to a target Unit.

name: Boomerang of Return

effects.action: Equip to a friendly Unit.
When the equipped Unit is destroyed, return it to your hand.

flavor_text: "What is given to the land always comes back."
visual_description: A finely carved wooden boomerang, decorated with intricate cross-hatching. It is shown in mid-flight, leaving a trail of glowing energy as it arcs back towards the thrower.

name: Tjurunga Stone

effects.action: Equip to a friendly Unit.
Equipped unit has +1/+1 and Elusive.

effects.action: Equip to a friendly Unit.
When equipped Unit deals combat damage to the enemy Nexus, draw a card.

visual_description: A small, carved wooden stick with notches and symbols on it. It is being passed from the hand of one messenger to another.

effects.action: When a friendly Unit Dreams to this Location, heal your Nexus for 2.

effects.action: When a friendly Unit Dreams to this Location, it gains +1/+0 until end of turn.

effects.action: If your Songline has 5 or more Locations, you may activate this: Win the game.

visual_description: The massive, iconic rock formation of Uluru is shown at sunset, glowing with an intense, spiritual red light. A powerful aura of energy radiates from it.

name: The Bungle Bungles

effects.action: When a friendly Unit Dreams to this Location, it gains Defender and Stealth until your next turn.

flavor_text: "A maze of stone, a fortress of the ancestors."
visual_description: The distinctive, beehive-shaped sandstone domes of the Bungle Bungle Range. The art captures the strange, otherworldly feel of the landscape.

effects.action: When a friendly Unit Dreams to this Location, you may search your Library for an Ancestor Spirit and put it into your hand.

flavor_text: "The stories are written on the stone for all to see."
visual_description: The inside of a rock shelter, its walls covered with ancient paintings of Wandjina and Gwion Gwion figures.

effects.action: When a friendly Unit Dreams to this Location, deal 2 damage to a random enemy Unit.

effects.action: When a friendly Unit Dreams to this Location, a target enemy Unit cannot attack next turn.

flavor_text: "A place of hunger and fear, where the Ngayurnangalku wait."
visual_description: A vast, blindingly white salt lake under a harsh sun. The air shimmers with heat and a sense of unease. There are no signs of life. [28]

name: The Three Sisters

effects.action: When a friendly Unit Dreams to this Location, create two 1/1 Spirit tokens.

flavor_text: "Turned to stone, they watch over their valley forever."
visual_description: The famous Three Sisters rock formation in the Blue Mountains, shrouded in blue mist. Three female spirits are faintly visible within the rock pillars.

name: Narabullgan, the Red Mountain

effects.action: When a friendly Unit Dreams to this Location, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

visual_description: A large, red mountain, standing alone on a plain. It has a powerful, sacred presence. [29]

name: Minalinka, the Lily Lagoon

effects.action: When a friendly Unit Dreams to this Location, you gain 2 Dreaming Essence.

flavor_text: "A place of peace, a gift from the Serpent."
visual_description: A beautiful lagoon covered in blooming water lilies. The water is calm and reflects the sky perfectly. [29]

name: The First Fire

effects.action: Deal 1 damage to all enemy Units.

flavor_text: "A gift from the Mimi, a power both creative and destructive."
visual_description: A small, controlled campfire is shown. From it, sparks fly out and singe the edges of the surrounding darkness.

name: Ceremonial Ground

effects.action: Your Ancestor Spirit units cost 1 less Aether to play.

flavor_text: "Here, the laws were given and the stories were first told."
visual_description: A cleared, circular space in the bush, with a central fire pit and logs for seating. The ground is stamped flat from generations of dancing.

name: The Starry Sky

effects.action: At the end of your turn, if you control a Songline of 4 or more Locations, look at the top card of your Library.

flavor_text: "The ancestors watch from their celestial camp."
visual_description: A brilliant night sky over the Australian outback, with the Milky Way clearly visible as the "Emu in the Sky" dark nebula.

name: The Land's Memory

effects.action: Return a Location card from your Void to your hand.

flavor_text: "The land does not forget."
visual_description: A ghostly, translucent image of a pristine, ancient landscape is shown superimposed over a modern, developed area, showing what was once there.

effects.action: Ambush. (You may play this card any time you could play an Invocation).

flavor_text: "A flash of teeth in the dark, a snarl from the shadows."
visual_description: A terrifying hybrid creature with the body of a man but the savage, snarling head and spotted fur of a quoll (a native carnivorous marsupial). [27]

name: Burrunjor, the Great Lizard

effects.action: Overwhelm. This Unit cannot use Dreaming.

visual_description: A massive, bipedal reptile resembling a Tyrannosaurus Rex, but with features of a goanna. It is shown crashing through the bush, its huge size dwarfing the trees. [27]

name: Papinijuwari, the Star-Eater

effects.action: Flying. Lifesteal.

flavor_text: "They ride the falling stars and feast on the sick and the dying."
visual_description: A frightening spirit being is shown riding a shooting star across the night sky. It holds a flaming stick and its eyes glow with malevolent hunger. [27]

name: Drop Bear

effects.action: This Unit deals 1 damage to a target enemy Unit.

visual_description: A large, monstrous koala with sharp fangs and claws, shown dropping from a eucalyptus tree onto an unsuspecting victim below. The art is both terrifying and slightly comical. [27]

name: Hoop Snake

effects.action: Haste.

flavor_text: "It bites its own tail and rolls like a wheel to chase its prey."
visual_description: A snake that has formed its body into a perfect circle, like a wheel, and is rolling at high speed across the ground.

effects.action: A-N-A-E-E-M.
Flying. Your Glyph units cannot be targeted by enemy Invocations.
Rearrange any number of your Glyph units.

visual_description: A being of pure, white, geometric light, shaped like a multi-winged humanoid but without a distinct face. It is composed of interlocking cubes, spheres, and fractals (Metatron's Cube). It hovers in a void of perfect blackness, radiating an intense, clean light.

name: The Great Table of Earth

effects.action: You may play cards with Call by paying Aether equal to their Call length instead of by controlling Glyph units.
For the rest of the game, your Calls require one less Glyph.

flavor_text: "The blueprint of creation, the map of all that is, was, and will be."
visual_description: A massive, floating table composed of four distinct elemental quadrants (the Watchtowers), each covered in a grid of glowing Enochian letters. In the center is a black cross (the Tablet of Union). The entire table radiates immense power. [23]

name: Comanan, Governor of LIL

effects.action: C-O-M-A-N-A-N.
As long as you control an Aethyr Location, enemy Units lose all abilities.

flavor_text: "In the first Aethyr, all is silent potential. Comanan ensures it remains so."
visual_description: A towering, crystalline figure that resembles a multi-faceted prism. It has no discernible limbs but refracts the light around it into a rainbow of colors. It stands perfectly still, emanating an aura of immense, silent power. The background is a shimmering, empty void. [24, 25]

name: Tabiton, Governor of DEO

effects.action: T-A-B-I-T-O-N.
Destroy all enemy Units with cost 3 or less.

visual_description: A powerful, four-winged angel made of solid gold light, holding a flaming sword and a set of scales. Its face is stern and judgmental.

name: The Tablet of Union

effects.action: When you play a card with Call, draw a card.
The next Call you make this turn requires one less Glyph.

flavor_text: "The black cross that binds the four elements into one."
visual_description: A floating black cross composed of 20 squares, each inscribed with a glowing Enochian letter. It is surrounded by a faint aura of pure spirit energy, distinct from the four elements. [23]

name: Lexarp, Governor of ZAX

effects.action: L-E-X-A-R-P.
Return a target enemy Unit to its owner's hand.

effects.action: When this Unit enters the field, you may search your Library for a Glyph unit and place it on top of your Library.

flavor_text: "They write the words that unmake and remake."

name: The First Key

effects.action: Search your Library for up to two Glyph units and put them into your hand.

flavor_text: "I reign over you, saith the God of Justice..."
visual_description: A beam of pure white light descends from the heavens, striking a complex circular diagram on the ground. As the light hits, Enochian letters around the circle flare up sequentially.

effects.action: Summon a Glyph unit from your Void directly onto the battlefield.

name: Aethyr of LIL

effects.action: The first Call you make each turn requires one less Glyph.

visual_description: A vast, empty void filled with shimmering, silent stars. The art conveys a sense of infinite space and profound peace.

effects.action: When you play a card with Call, look at the top card of your Library. You may put it into your Void.

effects.action: Look at the top three cards of your Library. You may reveal a Glyph unit and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom.

visual_description: A human scholar in robes, poring over a scroll covered in Enochian script. Floating, glowing glyphs surround him as he deciphers their meaning.

name: Guardian Kerub

effects.action: Defender.
When an enemy Invocation targets one of your Glyph units, you may have it target this Unit instead.

flavor_text: "They stand watch at the gates of understanding."
visual_description: A powerful, four-winged angel with the features of a lion, an ox, a man, and an eagle. It holds a flaming sword and stands guard before a celestial gate.

name: Lesser Angel of the Aethyr

effects.action: Flying.

flavor_text: "A messenger, a whisper from a higher sphere."
visual_description: A simple, two-winged angel made of white light, its form humanoid but indistinct. It flies through a starry void.

name: Resonance

effects.action: Choose a friendly Glyph unit. Create a copy of it.

flavor_text: "One voice becomes a chorus."
visual_description: A single glowing glyph is shown, and from it, an identical echo of the glyph emerges, vibrating with the same energy.

effects.action: Swap the positions of two friendly Glyph units. Draw a card.

flavor_text: "To change the word is to change the meaning."
visual_description: Two glowing glyphs on a celestial grid are shown swapping places in a flash of light, altering the "word" they form.

name: Scry the Aethyrs

effects.action: Look at the top two cards of your Library.

flavor_text: "The future is written in the heavens, for those who know how to look."
visual_description: A scrying mirror is shown, but instead of a reflection, it shows a swirling, cosmic view of one of the Aethyrs.

name: Word of Power

effects.action: If you control three or more Glyph units in a row, destroy a target enemy Unit.

flavor_text: "Some words are not meant to be spoken."
visual_description: Three glowing glyphs are shown in a line, and from them, a powerful beam of destructive energy erupts, striking an enemy.

effects.action: Destroy a target Location.

flavor_text: "To understand the language of creation is to know how to un-create."
visual_description: A glowing Enochian word is shown hovering over an enemy fortress. As the letters of the word rearrange themselves into nonsense, the fortress below crumbles into dust.

name: The Holy Table

effects.action: Once per turn, you may pay 2 Luminous Essence to look at the top card of your Library. If it is a Glyph unit, you may put it onto the battlefield.

flavor_text: "The focal point of the work, where the mundane and the divine meet."
visual_description: An ornate table covered with a silk cloth, upon which rests the Sigillum Dei Aemeth (a complex wax disc) and a crystal shew-stone. The air around it shimmers with magical potential. [24]

name: The Ring of Solomon

effects.action: Equip to a friendly Unit.
Equipped unit has, "Your opponent's Invocations that target this Unit cost 1 more Aether to play."

flavor_text: "A symbol of wisdom, and a tool of command."
visual_description: A simple brass ring with the Seal of Solomon inscribed on it. It glows with a protective, golden light.

name: The Scrying Stone

effects.action: Equip to a friendly Unit.
Tap this Unit. Look at the top card of your Library."

flavor_text: "Show me what is hidden."
visual_description: A polished, black obsidian sphere or a clear crystal ball. Within its depths, swirling images of the future can be seen.

name: The Liber Loagaeth

effects.action: Equip to your Leader.
At the start of your turn, you may look at the top card of your Library. If it is a card with Call, you may put it into your hand.

flavor_text: "The Book of the Speech of God. To read it is to hear the voice of creation."
visual_description: A massive, ancient book filled not with normal text, but with complex grids of Enochian letters and numbers. The pages seem to shimmer and move on their own. [23, 27]

name: The Second Key

effects.action: Look at the top five cards of your Library. Put one into your hand and the rest into your Void.

flavor_text: "Can the wings of the winds understand your voices of wonder?"
visual_description: A swirling vortex of wind and clouds is shown, with Enochian letters carried on the currents.

name: The Third Key

effects.action: Give all friendly Units +1/+1 until end of turn.

flavor_text: "Behold, saith your God, I am a circle on whose hands stand 12 kingdoms."
visual_description: A divine, radiant eye opens in the sky, and from it, twelve beams of light shine down, empowering the units on the field.

name: The Fourth Key

effects.action: Deal 2 damage to a target Unit.

flavor_text: "I have set my feet in the south, and have looked about me, saying, are not the thunders of increase numbered 33?"
visual_description: A bolt of lightning strikes down from a dark cloud, hitting a target on the ground with precision.

name: The Fifth Key

effects.action: Create two 1/1 Angel tokens with Flying.

flavor_text: "The mighty sounds have entered the third angle and are become as olives in the olive mount."
visual_description: Two small, simple angels of pure light are shown emerging from a glowing portal shaped like an olive leaf.

name: The Sixth Key

effects.action: Heal your Nexus for 3.

flavor_text: "The spirits of the fourth angle are nine, mighty in the firmament of waters."
visual_description: A gentle, healing rain of blue light falls from the sky, restoring vitality.

name: The Seventh Key

effects.action: Destroy a target enemy Unit with cost 2 or less.

flavor_text: "The east is a house of virgins singing praises among the flames of first glory."
visual_description: A chorus of angelic figures is shown singing, and their voices manifest as waves of purifying fire that consume a small, lesser demon.

name: The Eighth Key

effects.action: All friendly Units gain Defender until your next turn.

flavor_text: "The midday, the first, is as the third heaven made of hyacinth pillars."
visual_description: Massive, crystalline pillars of blue light erupt from the ground, forming a protective barrier around the player's units.

name: Māui, the Trickster Demigod

effects.action: When you switch the Tide, you may draw a card.
Switch the Tide. This ability can be used once per turn.

flavor_text: "He fished up islands with a jawbone and snared the sun in a net. The ocean learned long ago not to bet against him."
visual_description: A charismatic, powerfully built Polynesian man covered in intricate tattoos. He wields a large, magical fishhook and has a confident, mischievous grin. He is shown standing on a canoe, pulling a massive, glowing island up from the sea floor. The art style is vibrant and full of life.

name: Tagaro, the Creator

effects.action: Friendly Units have +2/+2.
Friendly Units have Elusive.
Switch the Tide.

flavor_text: "He made the world, and now he watches its tides, ever patient, ever present."
visual_description: A wise, ancient spirit who appears to be made of living coral and sea-stone. He has a long, flowing beard of seaweed. He is shown sitting cross-legged on the ocean floor, and the sea life around him is vibrant and healthy.

name: The Great Serpent of the Sea

effects.action: Overwhelm.
This Unit can attack enemy Units in the Support row.
This Unit has Stealth.

flavor_text: "Before the islands, there was only the sea. And the serpent."
visual_description: A colossal sea serpent, its body so long it seems to circle the horizon. Its scales shimmer with all the colors of the ocean. It is shown rising from a stormy sea. [1]

name: Qat, the Benevolent

effects.action: Create two 2/2 Human tokens.
Friendly Human Units have +1/+1.
Friendly Human Units have Defender.

flavor_text: "He cut the first men from wood, and gave them the gift of laughter."
visual_description: A kind-faced, benevolent deity carving small human figures from the wood of a dracaena tree. The figures are shown coming to life as he works. The scene is bright and creative. [1]

name: The Sun Snarer

effects.action: Switch the Tide. For the rest of the game, you may choose to not switch the Tide at the start of your turn.

flavor_text: "The days were too short for work and play, so Māui decided to have a word with the sun."
visual_description: Māui is shown on a mountaintop, throwing a massive net made of woven coconut fiber over the rising sun, trapping it and forcing it to slow its journey across the sky.

name: Adaro, the Poisonous Dart

effects.action: Gains +2 ATK.
Gains Deathtouch.

flavor_text: "He travels on the rainbow and strikes with the flying fish. Do not anger the sea."
visual_description: A merman-like spirit with gills behind his ears and a sharp horn on his head like a swordfish. His lower body is a powerful fish tail. He is shown leaping from a waterspout, hurling a glowing, poisonous flying fish like a dart.

name: Suqe-matua, the Foolish

effects.action: When you switch to High Tide, this Unit attacks a random enemy.
When you switch to Low Tide, this Unit deals 2 damage to itself.

flavor_text: "Whatever his brother made well, he made poorly. Such is the nature of opposition."
visual_description: A chaotic, clumsy-looking deity, the brother of Tagaro. He is shown trying to create something, but it is falling apart in his hands. His expression is one of perpetual frustration.

name: Abaia, the Magic Eel

Destroy a target enemy Relic.
Haste.

name: Persephone's Pomegranate

effects.action: Equip to a friendly Unit.
At the start of your turn, put the top card of your Library into your Void.
When the equipped Unit is destroyed, create a 1/1 Shade token.

flavor_text: "A single taste to bind a soul forever."
visual_description: A ripe pomegranate, split open to reveal six glowing, jewel-like seeds.

name: The Final Verdict

effects.action: Destroy all Units with ATK 4 or greater.

flavor_text: "He weighs the lives of heroes and kings, and finds them all wanting."
visual_description: The ghostly figure of King Minos sits on a judge's throne, pointing an accusatory finger. Before him, the souls of mighty warriors and kings are shown shrinking and fading away under his gaze.

name: Whispers from the Void

effects.action: Look at the top three cards of your Library. Put one into your hand and the rest into your Void.

flavor_text: "The dead know secrets the living cannot comprehend."
visual_description: A ghostly, spectral face whispers out of a dark, swirling portal (the Void), its words visible as faint, glowing runes.

name: Drain Life

effects.action: Deal 3 damage to a target Unit. Heal your Nexus for 3.

flavor_text: "Your life will sustain mine."
visual_description: A stream of red life energy is shown being pulled from an enemy creature and flowing into the caster, who glows with renewed vitality.

name: Unearth

effects.action: Return a friendly Unit with cost 1 from your Void to the battlefield.

flavor_text: "The grave cannot hold them."
visual_description: A skeletal hand bursts up from the earth of a graveyard, clawing its way back to the surface.

name: Grasp of the Dead

effects.action: Give a target enemy Unit -2/-2 until end of turn.

flavor_text: "The past will drag you down."
visual_description: Ghostly, skeletal hands erupt from the ground and grasp the legs of an enemy creature, holding it fast.

name: Soul Siphon

effects.action: Destroy a target Unit. Its controller puts the top 4 cards of their Library into their Void.

flavor_text: "A life for a memory."
visual_description: A wraith-like figure places a hand on an enemy's head. The enemy's body dissolves into dust while a stream of memories (visualized as images) flows from their head into the wraith.

name: The Weight of Ages

effects.action: All enemy Units get -1/-1 until end of turn.

flavor_text: "Time is the ultimate destroyer."
visual_description: An ancient, crumbling ruin is shown, with statues and pillars covered in moss and vines. The art conveys a sense of immense time and decay.

name: Prophecy of Tiresias

effects.action: Name a card type. Reveal the top card of your Library. If it is that type, draw it.

flavor_text: "The blind seer saw more than any with sight."
visual_description: The ghostly, blind prophet Tiresias is shown, his empty eyes glowing with inner light as he speaks a prophecy.

name: Mourning Fields

effects.action: When a friendly Unit is destroyed, you gain 1 Nexus health.

flavor_text: "A place for those who died of a broken heart."
visual_description: A desolate field under a grey sky, filled with weeping willow trees and populated by sorrowful, weeping shades.

name: The Gates of Horn and Ivory

effects.action: At the start of your turn, if you have 15 or more cards in your Void, you may look at your opponent's hand.

flavor_text: "One gate for true dreams, one for false. Can you tell the difference?"
visual_description: Two massive, ornate gates stand side-by-side. One is made of polished, translucent horn, showing true visions within. The other is made of gleaming, carved ivory, showing beautiful but deceptive illusions.

name: The Labyrinth of Souls

effects.action: When an opponent plays an Invocation, they must put the top card of their Library into their Void.

flavor_text: "To find your way out, you must first lose yourself."
visual_description: A vast, shadowy labyrinth with shifting walls. Ghostly figures wander its corridors, lost and confused.

name: Lost Shade

effects.action: Shade.

flavor_text: "It has forgotten its name, its life, its purpose."
visual_description: A simple, indistinct, translucent figure, looking lost and confused in the gloom of the underworld.

name: Wandering Ghost

effects.action: Shade.

flavor_text: "Forever searching for a peace it can never find."
visual_description: A slightly more defined ghostly figure, still translucent, but with a recognizable human shape. It is shown walking a lonely path.

name: Vengeful Spirit

effects.action: Shade. Haste.

flavor_text: "Its anger is the only thing that keeps it from fading."
visual_description: A ghostly figure with a furious expression and glowing red eyes. Its form is distorted by rage.

name: Guardian Shade

effects.action: Shade. Defender.

flavor_text: "Even in death, its watch continues."
visual_description: A ghostly warrior in full armor, standing guard. Its form is solid and resolute, unlike other shades.

name: Ancient Shade

effects.action: Shade.

flavor_text: "It remembers the world before the gods."
visual_description: A powerful, ancient-looking ghostly figure. It seems more solid and aware than other shades, its eyes holding immense wisdom and sorrow.

A swirling mass of shadow and flame, coalescing into a vaguely humanoid form with small, jagged horns and glowing red eyes. The creature is wreathed in smoke, its form indistinct and menacing. Style: Dark fantasy, ethereal, magical energy.

A being of pure light, with wings made of golden energy. Its form is androgynous and serene, holding a simple, glowing spear. The background is a blur of soft, divine light. Style: High fantasy, luminous, divine.
A translucent, ghostly figure of a warrior, barely visible. It carries a faint, glowing weapon and seems to be fading into the background. Style: Ethereal, ghostly, semi-transparent.
An ancient, ornate golden gear covered in glowing runes, floating in mid-air. It emits a soft, mechanical hum and sparks of blue energy. Style: Steampunk, magical artifact, intricate detail.
A star map in the shape of a mythical beast (e.g., a lion, a scorpion) formed from pinpricks of brilliant white and blue light against a dark, cosmic background. Style: Celestial, abstract, cosmic.
A dark, thorny vine wrapping around a cracked, purple orb. A sickly green mist emanates from the orb, and the air around it seems to warp and decay. Style: Dark magic, cursed object, ominous.
